p.e:
NAME: Juggernaut

ATK: 1 [1.5] [3/2]
DEF: 3 [0.5 deflector]
RNG: 7 [5] [3]

SPD: 1
CST: 5 & 2 energy

Counts as a vehicle
see back

Main gun [range 7] penetrates targes with all
targets in a line reciveing full damage.
each attack against it are damage-reduced
by 0.5.  secondary weapon can only be fired
when standing still for the turn and can't
target airborne foes. instead of fireing the main
gun a melee punch for 3dmg or a throw [ 3 atkr
infantry only] for 2 DMG against target and 
"projectile". Throws push back target 1 atkr but
not farther than max atkr. untargeted throws
possible. held enemys can still attack freely
1 scrap can be used to trade the penetration
of the main gun for  1.5 atkr pushback and stun
on infantry
